textos_fuente.text: Contact – Dante's Key West Pool Bar & Restaurant Skip to content Search for: HAPPY HOUR LUNCH DINNER SHOP CONTACT Search for: HAPPY HOUR LUNCH DINNER SHOP CONTACT HAPPY HOUR LUNCH DINNER SHOP CONTACT Contact Dante's Key West 2022-01-14T15:14:32+00:00 CONTACT US TODAY Dante’s Key West We are located at 951 Caroline Street in the Conch Harbor Plaza. The nearest cross street is Grinnell. Address: 951 Caroline St. Key West, FL 33040 Phone: 305-293-5123 Email: info@danteskeywest.com Hours: Lunch is served from 11AM – 6PM Dinner is served from 5:30PM – 10PM Please see below for map & directions as well as Frequently Asked Questions. There are multiple points of entry. From the boardwalk in the historic seaport: In between the Key West Ferry Terminal and Half Shell Raw Bar From the parking lot in between Turtle Kraal’s and the Half Shell: Just walk across the lot. From Caroline Street: Behind the West Marine From the Conch Harbor Plaza Parking Garage: Located at the end of Grinnell Street at Caroline. Parking available for: $5/hr or $35 for 24 hour period DANTE’S KEY WEST Frequently Asked Questions Bachelor & Bachelorette Parties While we do not accept reservations, here are some tips that may be useful: If you’re looking for a poolside table or lounge chairs(the hot spots), we recommend arriving at around opening at 11am. If you want to sleep in a bit, there will still be plenty of other seating available and servers to bring you all the food and drink you desire wherever you sit! The DJ is happy to make special announcements for you, just chat with them when you arrive for the day! Where Are You Located? We are located at 951 Caroline Street in the Conch Harbor Plaza. The nearest cross street is Grinnell. Do We Need To Make Reservations? No, we do not take reservations. However, if you have a group of 30 or more, please contact us at 305-293-5123 or at info@danteskeywest.com Is There A Cover Charge? There is no cover charge. All you have to do is actively eat & drink while you are here! What Time Does Dante’s Open? Dante’s Pool & Restaurant opens every day at 11AM and is open until 10PM. Lunch is served from 11AM – 6PM Dinner is served from 5:30PM – 10PM Lunch specials every day 11am-3pm. Check out our daily lunch specials on our Facebook page. Here’s some info that may be useful: If you’re looking to snag a poolside umbrella table or chaise lounges, we recommend arriving at or near opening at 11 AM. If that’s not important to you there will still be plenty of other seating available later in the day with servers to bring you all of your food and drinks wherever you land. The DJ starts at noon and plays until six (5pm in the winter)….. they’re happy to make any announcements for you just swing by the DJ tent that day. Contact Us 951 Caroline St. Key West, FL 33040 Phone: 305-293-5123 Email: Email Us Get Social About Us Live bands and DJ’s provide the soundtrack as bartenders prepare over-FUELed drinks and the kitchen turns the bounty of our local waters into mouth-watering delights! Stone crabs, lobster, oysters and always the freshest local fish, transformed into tacos, po’ boys and platters. Prime Steakhouse Visit Prime Steakhouse in Key West , just upstairs from Dante’s. Great steaks, the freshest seafood and fine wine selection. Dante's Key West Pool Bar & Restaurant ©  All rights reserved. This website meets WCAG 2.0/2.1 AA standards set by the ADA. View our ADA Accessibility Policy . Page load link Go to Top

Marathon Yacht Club is a great way to meet new people in the Marathon area. 305-743-6739 The Marathon Yacht Club, located in the heart of the Florida Keys, was founded in 1951. We have been part of the Florida Council of Yacht Clubs since 1983 and cater to boaters and non-boaters alike.  Our members enjoy activities such as socializing, dining, cruising (on land and water), fishing, parties, games, physical activities and more. Notifications Notifications How far is Marathon Florida from Key West and Key Largo Marathon, Florida is located in the middle of The Florida Keys and is referred to as ‘The Heart of The Florida Keys”. The Islands of Marathon stretch from mile marker 47, which is on the north side of the 7 Mile Bridge , and mile marker 59 in Grassy Key . Mile marker 106 is the first mile marker after crossing the 18 mile stretch at Key Largo and entering the Keys.  Mile marker 0 is located in Key West . Where is Marathon, Florida in The Florida Keys? Marathon, Florida is located in the middle of The Florida Keys.  It is a city spread over Knight's Key, Boot Key, Key Vaca, Fat Deer Key, Long Point Key, Crawl Key and Grassy Key islands in the middle of the Florida Keys.  It is in the County of Monroe in Florida. What’s Happening in Marathon & the Surrounding Florida Keys? Marathon Florida is a City made up of 13 islands located in the middle of The Florida Keys, about 50 miles north of Key West and about 50 miles south of Key Largo. Marathon Florida Keys boasts some of the best boating activities anywhere, including diving, snorkeling, and deep-sea, reef, and flats fishing. Add waterfront restaurants to a list of amenities, and you have a perfect vacation destination. production@MarathonFlorida.com (305) 587-9830 What is it like living in Marathon, Florida Keys? Marathon Florida is situated in Monroe County, in the middle of the Florida Keys, equally between Key Largo and Key West.  Marathon is one of the best places to live or vacation in Florida . Living in Marathon offers residents a dense suburban feel and most residents own their homes. Marathon offers a lot of bars, restaurants, coffee shops and attractions including the Turtle Hospital, Crane Point, The Dolphin Research Center, and the iconic 7 Mile Bridge. The public schools in Marathon are highly rated. Vacation Rentals in Marathon , Florida offer everything one needs for a stress free family get-away.
